/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of green and gray hues over the viewer. Vehicles, including cars and motorcycles, are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
